text: Jaba timī dharmayud'dhamā prāptahunē mālalā'ī prāpta garnakō nimti unīharūtira hiṇḍnēchau ta yī pachi parnēharūlē tatkāla bhannēchan ki ‘‘hāmīlā'ī pani āphnō sātha jāna anumati dinus’’ unīharūlē cāhanchan ki allāhakō kathanalā'ī parivartita garidi'un. Bhanidinus ki timī kahilyai pani hāmrō sāthamā hiṇḍna sakdainau. Allāhalē aghinai yastō bhanidi'ēkō cha. Ani bhannēchan (hō'ina) timī ta hāmīsita īṣryā gardachauṁ. Kurō yō cha ki tinīharūlē bahutai kama bujhchan
